title: Ignore the Olympics
author: VD
content_html:
I’m not into political activist posery, as a general rule. But the decision to hold the Olympics in the People’s Republic of China is an appalling decision that stinks in the nostrils of every decent human being on the planet, particularly in light of the brutal oppression that has characterized the Chinese occupation of Tibet.

So, don’t look for any discussion of the Olympic Games here. This blog will be ignoring them and flying the flag of a free Tibet for the duration of this farce of an Olympics.
content_text:

the Chinese occupation of Tibet
.
So, don’t look for any discussion of the Olympic Games here.  This blog will be ignoring them and flying the flag of a free Tibet for the duration of this farce of an Olympics.
